text: Hi guys, just starting to figure out the email temps. Our main one uses `<html bgcolor="{{ background_color }}" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; background-color: {{ background_color }}">` but i am not seeing a stylesheet that the temp is linked to our where it would pull `{{ background_color }}` is there a default hs email css file? or is `{{ background_color }}` gathered somewhere within that file?
I believe that comes from content settings
There's a page where you can set a handful of colors
